body_html:
Sorry, I cannot replicate it anymore, as later I've reinstalled pytorch from the Archlinux repos and now it works like a charm.

Anyway, it seems that the underlying problem was that the version from pytorch.org is compiled using CUDA 9.1.85, but on my system I had CUDA 9.2.88.

Thanks, Narunas

body:
Sorry, I cannot replicate it anymore, as later I've reinstalled `pytorch` from the `Archlinux` repos and now it works like a charm. 

Anyway, it seems that the underlying problem was that the version from `pytorch.org` is compiled using `CUDA 9.1.85`, but on my system I had `CUDA 9.2.88`.

Thanks, Narunas
